description:
Tsukino goes to visit her mother’s grave, while Kawachi goes up against Katsuo in the contest. After seeing what Tsukino has lost, the South Tokyo crew makes a vow to win for her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avec toutes nos prières ! Le serment devant la tombe
Inori o Komete!! Bozen no Chikai!
With Our Prayers Behind It!! A Graveside Vow!
ตั้งจิตอธิษฐาน สาบานต่อหน้าหลุมศพ!
祈りをこめて!! 墓前の誓い!
